name: Data Visualisation Moodboard
description:
Find the best data visualisation !


  • Add your Goals and Data you want to work with on the Post-it.
  • Add images for each moodboard Visual, focus on graph, and Story, focused on concept.
  • Vote for the best inspirations and the informations you want to focus on for the data visualisation
  • Move the winners in the first round circle (grey)
  • Move the final elements in the Green circle : 1 Goal, up to 3 Data, 1 Visual and 1 Story
